title: "name removed" this person is a boosted trash
body:
He just trolled me last game.

If you check op.gg you will see he was D5 about 1 month ago but he play like a real bronze . usually like 5/15  4/12  5/13    0/9   ( droped down to gold elo from d5 and still have a negative KDA as JG/TOP)  

he main teemo btw

replies.body: The fact you care so much about that one game enough to post his ign on boards is quite sad.
the fact that instead of supporting him, you are being toxic, so sad.

I agree with Yukuu. Sure submit a report or a support ticket, but making a thread for it on the boards is alot of effort and you should already know that moderators don't like 'name and shame', also he could just be playing badly or maybe the meta has shifted to punish teemo more (I didn't even know people played teemo above bronze). Maybe his internet has gone bad or maybe he doesn't have as much time to play. So many things it could be and it's not really your business, so why stress out about it?

Mhmm, if he's that bad just contact Riot lol. 
I don't see the effort in naming and shaming on boards after 1-2 games. He'll probably never see this person again so why flame on boards
But it happens to me every game i swear daddy...
